description: Stuck for Christmas gift ideas? Look no further than this luxurious fiery chili oil recipe. The perfect Christmas condiment to gift to family and friends with love.
keywords: Sauce & condiment,Pescatarian,Seafood free,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Halal,Christmas,Soy free,Wheat free,Vegetarian,Dec 2020,Vegan,Dairy free,Peanut free
name: Chilli Oil Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Combine garlic, chilli flakes and chilli powder in a bowl. Place oil, cloves, star anise and bay leaves in a saucepan over low heat for 5 minutes or until small bubbles rise to the surface. Pour over chilli mixture and combine. Store in a sterilised glass jar or an airtight container in the fridge for up to six months.
